feed.title: Procyon Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Procyon news and events.

entry.title: Procyon's First Stable Version
entry.summary: Most of people wonder when the first stable version of the Procyon will be released. The only thing I can say is the fact that it will be released soon. Wait for it!, You won't regret for waiting. It will be legendary. We are working hard.
